titles: The throne of David, or An exposition of the second of Samuell wherein is set downe the pattern of a pious and prudent Prince, and a clear type of of [sic] the Prince of Princes Christ Iesus the sonne of David and his spirituall kingdome by William Guild D.D. and minister of Gods word at King-Edward in Scotland.
author: Guild, William, 1586-1657.
publisher: printed by W. Hall for Rob. Blagrave,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bible. --  O.T. --  Samuel II --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
